thread.section_title: YesStyle.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of YesStyle.com | www.yesstyle.com
thread.title: Adriana Pérez

author: Adriana Pérez
title: Adriana Pérez
text: Sometimes they don't have stock but continue offering some items and this is sad because you have to wait for nothing, they do refunds, the customer service reply fast and offer solutions too, so that is the good part. The quality and products are good in the mostly items I've bought, specially the makeup and clothes for that reason I recommend this website.
